name: MPLOYR
overview:
In February 2008, the founder of MPLOYR set out to create a free employment website like where job seekers and employers could connect. Soon thereafter, inspired by Guy Kawasaki of Alltop, MPLOYR Express was launched as the first website to help explore your passions by collecting jobs from â€œall the topâ€ sites on the web.

MPLOYR was founded by Eugene Gregorio, a 25 year old serial entrepreneur from Vancouver, British Columbia. He wanted MPLOYR and MPLOYR Express to be a place where employers could advertise and post listings for free to help them save money in tough economic times.

MPLOYR started only serving British Columbia and some parts of Canada but because of its many successes and demands made by others to make it available in other regions, the MPLOYR team listened and got to work quickly. They are excited to announce the launch of MPLOYR in 6 different core regions and MPLOYR Express in 60 different countries and territories aggregating tech jobs from the web.

This is the first of several site enhancements that will further the companyâ€™s reputation as one of the leading provider of jobs in New Media, IT and Engineering in the world.

Additionally, MPLOYR provides job seekers and employers with:

  • Post jobs without an account
  • Search for jobs
  • Apply to interesting jobs
  • RSS feeds
  • Site-widget to show jobs on other sites
  • Bookmarking feature
  • And much moreâ€¦
